content: I was working on #15159 which adds a organisation level setting for configuring invite link creation permissions. So, now non-admins users can also create invite links. Do we also want to allow non-admins to revoke the multiuse invitations created by them ?
What would be the alternative if non-admins couldn't revoke? Would they have to ask an admin to revoke?
Yes, in that case only admins will be able to revoke the invitations.
Got it. From a UX standpoint, if I as a user can do something, it seems like I ought to be able to undo it, too.
Yeah, I also think we should allow non-admins to revoke invitation links created by them. We do allow them to revoke the email invitations sent by themselves.
Yes, I have updated the PR to allow revoking invitations by non-admins.
